relationships.description: Mike Cohen forwards political content to Terry who then forwards to extensive distribution list
Jeff Epstein included in mass email distribution list regarding political issue

analysis.purpose: To distribute a political video opposing the Iran Nuclear Deal and encourage recipients to contact Congressional representatives
analysis.significance: Shows political activism and networking among a broad distribution list including Jeffrey Epstein

notable_quotes: The wellbeing of your children and grandchildren depend upon it!
This is the fastest turn-around time on any video we've released in PragerU's history, but what's at stake is so monumentally important, we knew we couldn't waste any time.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - this is a straightforward political advocacy email

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is political advocacy content about the Iran Nuclear Deal

public_knowledge.context: The Iran Nuclear Deal was a major international agreement widely covered in media in 2015

analysis.summary: This is a forwarded email chain from August 2015 distributing a Dennis Prager video opposing the Iran Nuclear Deal, urging recipients to contact Congressional representatives and share the video with others, with Jeff Epstein included in the extensive distribution list.
